about_the_game:
You play as the robot, GT-6301, discovering the Evil Factory’s secrets and fighting for the freedom and dignity of robot-kind. Explore the factory, inside and out, dodge security drones, and stop the robot foreman’s evil plans. Make well-intentioned allies along the way as you enter the factory’s themed sectors and oppose their slave-driving officers.



In this real-time battle RPG, you will collect battle disks to build your deck and use skillful combo attacks on waves of robot foes. Various interactive battle environments keep you on your toes –or treads.

STORY


GT begins life anew with a factory reset! With none of his old memories to distract him, he is enlisted in the army of robots who defend robot-kind against human invaders. However, due a defect in his reprogramming, GT refuses to carry out orders, which is punishable by termination! Now he must fight to survive and rebel against the factory's evil plans!

GAMEPLAY


GT and the Evil Factory is a card collecting, turn-based, action battle game! You will collect cards, customize your deck and use your skills to tactfully defeat your robot foes! The cards you collect are called Battle Disks, which manifest as powerful physical attacks. Collect as many as you can and experiment with various combinations to build an effective deck!
